stanza.line: When my love swears that she is made of truthtruth
I do believe her though I know she lieslies
That she might think me some untutored youthyouth
Unlearned in the world false subtletiessubtleties
Thus vainly thinking that she thinks me youngyoung
Although she knows my days are past the bestbest
Simply I credit her false-speaking tonguetongue
On both sides thus is simple truth suppressedsuppressed
But wherefore says she not she is unjustunjust
And wherefore say not I that I am oldold
O love best habit is in seeming trusttrust
And age in love loves not to have years toldtold
Therefore I lie with her and she with meme
And in our faults by lies we flattered bebe
